channel.title: Help needed, making my server public
channel.description:
ok guys im a newb when it comes to this im just trying to host the server i allrdy have (noobscape v3) for a few of my friends to play around in
i have edited the NOOBscape V3\Server\src\org\rscdaemon\server\server.java to have my ip & my port number i have also edeted the setings.ini file in the client folder,, (old dead link) (entire client folder) now it works fine for me when i host on my desktop(witch is where i will allways host from) i can play on my laptop via wifi no problem,, but when i sent the client folder to my friend so he join just says unabe to connect my port is forwarded
i am sure i have missed something i am very newbish when it comes to this, i will try to get better. but if i cant get any of my friends on my server i dont rly see the point of having it
i have vent, msn, team viewer, if i need help that way
thanks for trying to help out this newb
thanks kryptix for the help you have put in so far

item.title: Help needed, making my server public
item.dc:creator: @dedblu2005 dedblu2005@hotmail.com
item.description:
@dedblu2005 wrote:

ok guys im a newb when it comes to this
im just trying to host the server i allrdy have (noobscape v3) for a few of my friends to play around in

i have edited the NOOBscape V3\Server\src\org\rscdaemon\server\server.java
to have my ip & my port number
i have also edeted the setings.ini file in the client folder,
(old dead link) (entire client folder)
now it works fine for me when i host on my desktop(witch is where i will allways host from)
i can play on my laptop via wifi no problem, but when i sent the client folder to my friend so he join just says unabe to connect
my port is forwarded

i am sure i have missed something
i am very newbish when it comes to this, i will try to get better.
but if i cant get any of my friends on my server i dont rly see the point of having it

i have vent, msn, team viewer, if i need help that way

thanks for trying to help out this newb

thanks kryptix for the help you have put in so far
